attributes.action: Condemn attacks by "Israeli Defence Force" in Gaza
attributes.additional_details:
Dear Ministry of Justice,

In the light of a statement by Israeli Deputy Prime Minster Eli Yishai that "The goal of the operation is to send Gaza back to the Middle Ages", I ask you to condemn the recent attacks by the "Israeli Defence Force" in Gaza, which you will remember David Cameron likened to a "prison camp" in July 2010.

Unless you share the want of Eli Yishai to "send Gaza back to the Middle Ages", please do your utmost to ensure that Prime Minister David Cameron, and Foreign Secretary William Hague, call for an immediate cease fire, and condemn this attack.

Yours faithfully,
